interfaceFramework.Pacman

    interfaceFramework  

    • Uses of Pacman in interfaceFramework

      Methods in interfaceFramework with parameters of type Pacman 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Map.addExtras(Pacman pacman, Graphics g)
      Method that creates additional graphics: score and lives It also sets fonts, colours and appropriate images for these particular graphics
      static void UserControls.checkCollision(Pacman pacman, Ghost ghost) 
      static boolean UserControls.checkMove(Pacman pacman, int[][] board, boolean tunnel)
      The checkMove() method checks if it is possible for pacman to move in a specific direction by ensuring that there is no wall in his upcoming position.
      static boolean UserControls.checkMoveForStored(Pacman pacman, int[][] board, boolean tunnel)
      The checkMoveForStored() method checks if it is possible for pacman to move in a direction that has previously been inputted, by ensuring that there is no wall in his upcoming position.
      static boolean UserControls.moveDown(Pacman pacman, int[][] board)
      The moveDown() method checks if it is possible for pacman to move down by ensuring that there is no wall in his upcoming position.
      static boolean UserControls.moveLeft(Pacman pacman, int[][] board)
      The moveLeft() method checks if it is possible for pacman to move left by ensuring that there is no wall in his upcoming position.
      void Pinky.movePossible(Pacman pacman, int[][] board, Graphics g)
      Checking the possible movements that can be done by pinky if it is in scatter,chase or frightened move
      void Inky.movePossible(Pacman pacman, int[][] board, Graphics g)
      Checking the possible movements that can be done by inky if it is in scatter,chase or frightened move
      void Clyde.movePossible(Pacman pacman, int[][] board, Graphics g)
      Checking the possible movements that can be done by clyde if it is in scatter,chase or frightened move
      void Blinky.movePossible(Pacman pacman, int[][] board, Graphics g)
      Checking the possible movements that can be done by blinky if it is in scatter,chase or frightened move
      static boolean UserControls.moveRight(Pacman pacman, int[][] board)
      The moveRight() method checks if it is possible for pacman to move Right by ensuring that there is no wall in his upcoming position.
      static boolean UserControls.moveUp(Pacman pacman, int[][] board)
      The moveUp() method checks if it is possible for pacman to move up by ensuring that there is no wall in his upcoming position.
      void Clyde.outsideProximityChase(Pacman pacman, int[][] board)
      Checking if pacman is close enough to clyde, when in scatter mode.
      static void Game.restartGame(Pacman pacman, Graphics g)
      restarts the game based on loss of life
      boolean Clyde.withinProximity(Pacman pacman)
      Checking if pacman is close enough to clyde
